case_title: RIAZ HUSSAIN And Others vs Syed MANZOOR HUSSAIN SHAH And OTHER
respondent: Syed MANZOOR HUSSAIN SHAH And OTHER

final_order.instructions: Original application for review restored before Tehsildar/Assistant Collector, 1st Grade for fresh decision in accordance with law.

statutes: Section 163 of the Land Revenue Act
Rule 6 of West Pakistan Land Revenue Rules, 1968

additional_notes.issue_highlighted: Original application for partition included names of deceased co-sharers.
additional_notes.clarification: Failure of Tehsildar to seek higher authority's permission does not penalize petitioners.
